name: ice_age
description: Comprehensive Ice Age mechanics pack: cumulative upkeep, snow-covered land interactions (pre-snow mana symbol), slowtrip cantrips, world enchantments, depletion lands, allied painlands, color hosers, banding, rampage, and era-appropriate effects.

WORLD_RULE: World — (If another permanent with World is on the battlefield, sacrifice this.)
SLOWTRIP: Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
AGE_COUNTER_RULE: At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent. Then you may pay its cumulative upkeep cost for each age counter on it. If you don't, sacrifice it.
CUMUP_COST_U: Exile the top card of your library
CUMUP_COST_B: Exile a card from your graveyard

HOSER_RED_FROM_BLUE: Choose one — Counter target spell if it's red; or destroy target permanent if it's red.
HOSER_BLUE_FROM_RED: Choose one — Counter target spell if it's blue; or destroy target permanent if it's blue.
HOSER_GREEN_FROM_BLACK: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated.

BANDING_HELPER: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. You divide combat damage among creatures in a band.)
RAMPAGE_HELPER: Rampage {1} (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
